name: Magnecube (Eternal CODE Studio)
description:
Magnecube is a game only available for Android on the Google Play Store.

In Magnecube you are a magnet with a square shape.

Your goal is to reach the exit in each level.

In Magnecube you can create your own levels using the level editor and then publish them to the Internet so that other users can play them (Required and Eternal CODE Studio account for publishing levels).

You can play the story mode or the on-line mode.

The story mode are a series of level that come with the game and that show you progressively the objects and mechanics of the game.

To play the on-line mode you need an Eternal CODE Studio account. The on-line mode allows you to play any level that has been published by someone around the world.

This game will surely make you use your brain to solve puzzles, or to make the life miserable to others with the levels that you create.

We hope you have fun playing our game :)
